alert.note: Alert for Northern Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 4:59PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Calcasieu Parish, southwestern Newton and northeastern Orange Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 459 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Devils Pocket, or near Deweyville, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Starks, Deweyville, Mauriceville, Hartburg, Forest Heights, and Devils Pocket. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
